ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Song DB Model. (request for comments)
ygData.msgSnippet: Hehe CNE, MCSE, CCNA myself However, I was a Senior Guide in the Guide program and some inside information given to me by a few former GMs pretty bluntly
ygData.messageBody:
Hehe
CNE, MCSE, CCNA myself

However, I was a Senior Guide in the Guide program and some 'inside'
information given to me by a few former GMs pretty bluntly pointed out that
Verant does NOT pay competitive salaries.

Don't even DREAM about working for them. They're asking for a prince when
they won't pay for a pauper.

hehehe did you know Verant GM's are lucky to make $10/hour
In SAN DIEGO CA????

LAUGH!!!

---------------------
Lyrnia Jongleur
Bard of Norrath
----- Original Message -----
From: "Ryan Honeyman" <honeyman@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, March 17, 2000 3:55 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Song DB Model. (request for comments)


> From: Ryan Honeyman <honeyman@...>
>
>
> > Harmonic, you so rock. And I actually understood most of that.
> >
>
> /blush
>
> Hey I wonder if that Sr. Admin position is still open at Verant?
>
> Hehe. I have all the things they require except a CCIE.. well,
> that's ok, since there are less than a few thousand CCIE's in
> the world! Silly Verant! I almost have my CCNA. <g>
> Any Cisco freaks on the list?
>
> Hmmm... my company works with Lucas.... hmmm, Verant is going to
> work with Lucas... hmmm... I smell a trip to California coming
> up ;-)
>
> Harmonic, my boss is playing a huge interoffice Age of Empires
> game now. Yesterday, it was Starcraft. E3 here I come! My
> homework last night from work was to demo a couple of new games
> coming out... I tell ya it's tough work - hehe.
>
>
